import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import HeroImage from './../projectPage/HeroImage.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import VideoSection from './../projectPage/VideoSection.js' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroImage':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/hero-image.png'), } const a = { 'height':"320px", 'textSpacing':"0px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/1.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/2.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/3.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/4.png'), } function PeoplePod(props) { return(
) } export default PeoplePod;
